#UGC 2953 #SPARC is a database of 175 late-type galaxies (spirals and irregulars) with Spitzer photometry at 3.6 mu (tracing the stellar mass distribution) and high-quality HI+Halpha rotation curves (tracing the gravitational potential out to large radii).
# Distance = 16.5 Mpc
